0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO STOP AND PROHIBIT THE IMPLEMENTATION OF INITIAL  COIN OFFERINGS (ICO) AND OTHER SIMILAR UNREGULATED INVESTMENT SCHEMES, TO CREATE AND ESTABLISH THE PROPER REGULATORY PROCEDURES, TO PROTECT THE RIGHTS OF THE INVESTING PUBLIC
